question: Which of the following act was passed to nullify the shortcomings of the Regulating Act of 1773?
explanation: To nullify the shortcomings of the Regulating Act of 1773, an act was passed in the year 1781 which is known as the Judicature Act. Another name of this Act is the Declaratory Act of 1781. It was passed to settle the conflict between the Supreme Court and the Governor-General in Council.
